== Zeitgeist Core Classes ==

Overview of Zeitgeist Classes

 * [ClassActionlog actionlog]: tracking of requests
 * [ClassConfiguration configuration]: handles loading & using configuration files
 * [ClassController controller]: front controller
 * [ClassDatabase database]: simple database abstraction(MySQL)
 * [ClassDebug debug]: debug & tracing functionality
 * [ClassDebug debugdummy]: empty class as substitute for the real debug class
 * [ClassErrorhandler errorhandler]: handles PHP errors, warning etc.
 * [ClassFiles files]: simple file handling abstraction
 * [ClassLocalisation localisation]: localisation functionalities
 * [ClassMessages messages]: message system
 * [ClassObjects objects]: object system
 * [ClassParameters parameters]: input filter
 * [ClassSession session]: session handling
 * [ClassTemplate template]: template system
 * [ClassUserdata userdata]: handles project specific data
 * [ClassUserfunctions userfunctions]: general user functionalities
 * [ClassUserhandler userhandler]: currently active user
 * [ClassUserrights userrights]: handling user rights
 * [ClassUserroles userroles]: handling user roles
